Grove.grove_soundsensor: Read the sound sensor value at specified Grove port, the value is between 0 to 1023
Grove.grove_loudnesssensor: Read the loudness sensor value at specified Grove port, the value is between 0 to 1023
Grove.grove_ultrasonic: Get the distance from Grove-Ultrasonic Sensor, the measuring range is between 2-350cm
Grove.minifan: Set the speed of mini fan, the speed is between 0 to 100
Grove.minifanOnOff: Turn on or off the mini fan motor
Grove.servo: Set the servo angle, the angle is between 0 to 180Â°
